description:
It is not a unfair platformer but its very challenging.
Play 60 unique levels in 4 game modes!
Each level requires skill, death and practice. Blindy is a hardcore platformer, an exciting, challenging game for anyone. Still want more?
Find a coin hidden in every level!
Try to not smash your device.
name: Blindy
intro: Take 2D platformer, add some souls-like difficulty, get rid of all useless stuff and turn lights off - that's Blindy.
